param.name: syllabus_exts
param.label: Syllabus File Extensions
param.description: Only files with extensions in this list will be accepted for upload. Separate extensions with a semicolon.

param.name: syllabus_maxsize
param.label: Syllabus File Maximum Size
param.description: Maximum size in bytes of uploaded files (e.g. enter 2000000 for 2MB)
